game_description: Stone Age Racing is a fast-paced, Indy-style timed circuit race that will challenge you physically and mentally! Designed in Oculus Quill and transformed into a full action first-person game, Stone Age Racing gives you an enhanced experience within a Quill world where you, the player, navigate and interact with the environment like never before. You are no longer just an observer but now a full participant, interacting and influencing the final outcome!
review_1: I load in out side the car
review_2: An interesting title that has a neat art style but fails to impress anywhere else. Unfortunately the driving feels totally off which combined with the basic looking game makes this basically an early racing game test. While I love seeing free games on app lab especially racing ones I think this game is far too lacking to be worth your time unless you just enjoy testing this stuff out for a laugh. Video - https://youtu.be/b98dVZ82IKs
